topic.title: Markdown is easy to learn and use

ul.li: Simplicity: Markdown is easy to learn and use. Its syntax is straightforward and intuitive.
Portability: Markdown documents can be viewed in any text editor and easily converted to other formats like HTML or PDF.
Versatility: Markdown supports a wide range of formatting options, including headers, lists, code blocks, and more.
Widely Supported: Many platforms and tools support Markdown, making it a flexible choice for writing content.
